info.title: LemonData AI Gateway
info.description:
Access **300+ AI models** through a unified OpenAI-compatible API. Supports chat completions, embeddings, image generation, audio (TTS/STT), and video generation.

**Base URL:** `https://api.lemondata.cc`

**Authentication:** Include your API key in the `Authorization` header: `Bearer sk-xxx`

post.description: Creates a model response for the given chat conversation. Supports streaming and function calling.

schema.description: Server-Sent Events stream with JSON chunks

post.description: Creates an embedding vector representing the input text.

value.input: The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog

post.description: Creates an image given a prompt.
Generates audio from the input text (Text-to-Speech).

value.input: This is high quality speech synthesis.

post.description: Creates a video generation task. Videos are generated asynchronously. Use the task ID to poll for completion.

value.prompt: A cinematic shot of a golden retriever running through a field of sunflowers
Make this image come alive with gentle movement

get.description: Retrieves the status and result of a video generation task.
Retrieves a model instance, providing basic information about the model.

post.description:
Creates a model response using Anthropic's native request format. Supports Claude models with vision and streaming.

**Authentication:** Use `x-api-key` header or `Authorization: Bearer` header.

schema.description: Anthropic-style SSE stream with message_start, content_block_delta, message_stop events

post.description:
Generates content using Google Gemini API format. Supports text and vision models.

**Authentication:** Use `?key=` query parameter, `x-goog-api-key` header, or `Authorization: Bearer` header.

Streams content generation using Google Gemini API format. Returns Server-Sent Events.

**Authentication:** Use `?key=` query parameter, `x-goog-api-key` header, or `Authorization: Bearer` header.

schema.description: SSE stream with Gemini response chunks

post.description: Creates a response using the OpenAI Responses API format. Supports stateful conversation management.
Reranks documents by relevance to a query using semantic similarity.
Creates a music generation task using Suno. Returns a task ID for polling.

get.description: Retrieves the status and result of a music generation task.

post.description: Creates a 3D model generation task using Tripo3D. Returns a task ID for polling.

get.description: Retrieves the status and result of a 3D generation task.

BearerAuth.description: API Key authentication. Get your API key from the dashboard.

model.description: ID of the model to use (e.g., gpt-4o, claude-3-5-sonnet)

messages.description: A list of messages comprising the conversation

stream.description: If true, returns a stream of events

max_tokens.description: Maximum number of tokens to generate

tools.description: List of tools the model may call

role.description: The role of the message author

name.description: Name of the function/tool (for function/tool messages)

tool_calls.description: Tool calls made by the assistant

tool_call_id.description: ID of the tool call being responded to

model.description: ID of the model to use

negative_prompt.description: What to avoid in the video

upstream.description: Upstream provider that caused the error

max_tokens.description: Maximum number of tokens to generate

Unauthorized.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or missing API key

PaymentRequired.description: Payment Required - Insufficient balance or quota exceeded

error.message: Insufficient balance. Please top up your account.
Rate limit exceeded. Please slow down.
All available channels failed to process the request
